document.masterDocTitle: Catalogue of the mite family Tydeidae (Acari: Prostigmata) with the world key to the species

278 .
Tydeus africanus Baker , 1970 : 172
, South Africa , from lemon.

National Museum of Natural History ( NMNH ), Washington, D.C., USA .

279 .

)

original,

Kaźmierski ( 1998 ).

Unknown.

.

: 54 , from grapevine, rubber trees, walnuts and peach trees. It has been distributed in worldwide.

)

.

300 .
Tydeus kochi
Oudemans, 1928
: 378
, This species is widely distributed throughout the world and has been found in all types of climatic zones, from moss, lichens and
Vitis
spp.

original,

,

(

names:

, Kaźmierski ( 1998 ).

sp.

304 .

Baker , 1965
)

306 .

.

names:
